data: `minecraft:navigation.float` allows this entity to generate paths by flying around the air like the regular Ghast.

data.Name: avoid_damage_blocks
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder to avoid blocks that cause damage when finding a path

data.Name: avoid_portals
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder to avoid portals (like nether portals) when finding a path

data.Name: avoid_sun
data.Description: Whether or not the pathfinder should avoid tiles that are exposed to the sun when creating paths

data.Name: avoid_water
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder to avoid water when creating a path

data.Name: blocks_to_avoid
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder which blocks to avoid when creating a path

data.Name: can_breach
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can jump out of water (like a dolphin)

data.Name: can_break_doors
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder that it can path through a closed door and break it

data.Name: can_jump
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can jump up blocks

data.Name: can_open_doors
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder that it can path through a closed door assuming the AI will open the door

data.Name: can_open_iron_doors
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder that it can path through a closed iron door assuming the AI will open the door

data.Name: can_pass_doors
data.Description: Whether a path can be created through a door

data.Name: can_path_from_air
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder that it can start pathing when in the air

data.Name: can_path_over_lava
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can travel on the surface of the lava

data.Name: can_path_over_water
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can travel on the surface of the water

data.Name: can_sink
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it will be pulled down by gravity while in water

data.Name: can_swim
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can path anywhere through water and plays swimming animation along that path

data.Name: can_walk
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can walk on the ground outside water

data.Name: can_walk_in_lava
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can travel in lava like walking on ground

data.Name: is_amphibious
data.Description: Tells the pathfinder whether or not it can walk on the ground underwater
